title: How to learn Python
description: Python is a high-level, interpreted, and general-purpose programming language known for its simplicity, readability, and versatility. It was created by Guido van Rossum and first released in 1991. Python has become one of the most popular programming languages in the world due to its ease of use and extensive libraries, making it suitable for various applications, including web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, machine learning, scientific computing, and automation.
author: @isahildhillon
